thread.title: Drinks events: Cheer on the Cubs with a Cubby Blue martini at Sullivan's
thread.title_full: Drinks events: Cheer on the Cubs with a Cubby Blue martini at Sullivan's

author: Sara Hooker
title: Drinks events: Cheer on the Cubs with a Cubby Blue martini at Sullivan's
text:
Sullivan's Cubby Blue As the Cubs make their way through the playoffs, order the Cubby Blue martini for $11 and receive a complimentary bar appetizer. Choose between the Philly cheesesteak egg rolls, loaded potato tots or blue cheese chips (limit one per two guests). Also, with the martini purchase, enter your name to win a World Series party for 10 in Sullivan's board room. Sullivan's Steakhouse is at 244 S. Main St., Naperville. (630) 305-0230 or sullivanssteakhouse.com .
Tokio's Halloween beer dinner Tokio Pub joins up with Boulevard Brewing Company for a four-course Halloween beer dinner beginning at 6:30 p.m. Monday, Oct. 26. Spooky eats include the full moon trio, black caldron pasta, braised rabbit and a chocolate stout cupcake for dessert. Beer pairings include Tell Tale Heart, Tank 7 Saison, 80 Acre Hoppy Wheat and Funky Pumpkin. $45 per person, tax and gratuity not included. Tokio Pub is at 1900 E. Higgins Road, Schaumburg. (847) 278-5181 or tokiopub.com .
Snuggery's $6 specials The Snuggery Schaumburg serves up $6 cocktails everyday. Pick from a list of 11 that includes classic mojitos, 20-ounce Long Islands, strawberry lemonade shake-ups, skinny white peach sangria and skinny superfruit sangria. Also included are cocktails like the red apple hooch, made of Kentucky Fire Whiskey, Dekuyper Sour Apple Pucker, cranberry juice and lemon sour. Munch on $3.99 happy hour apps in the bar from 3 to 6 p.m. The Snuggery is at 1540 N. Roselle Road, Schaumburg. (847) 519-7555 or snuggerychicago.com .
